item.title: [PI] Commands.java Error!
item.dc:creator: @DynastyRSPS DynastyRSPS
item.description:
@DynastyRSPS wrote:

Makes no sense whatsoever. I try adding this code before the player name.

Misc.ucFirst

It works for admin, but not for any else.

if (playerCommand.startsWith("yell")) { String rank = ""; String Message = playerCommand.substring(4).toLowerCase(); if (c.playerRights >= 0) { rank = "[Player]["+ Misc.ucFirstc.playerName +"]:"; if (c.playerRights >= 1) { rank = "@blu@[Mod]@bla@["+ Misc.ucFirstc.playerName +"]:"; } if (c.playerRights >= 2) { rank = "@red@[Admin]@bla@["+ Misc.ucFirstc.playerName +"]:"; } if (c.playerRights >= 3) { rank = "@red@[Admin]@bla@["+ Misc.ucFirstc.playerName +"] : "; } if (c.playerRights >= 4) { rank = "[Player]["+ Misc.ucFirstc.playerName +"]:"; } for (int j = 0; j < Server.playerHandler.players.length; j++) { if (Server.playerHandler.players[j] != null) { Client c2 = (Client)Server.playerHandler.players[j]; c2.sendMessage(rank+Message); } }

Is my yell code. Please tell me what I’m doing wrong.

Read full topic
